name: Kilo Code for JetBrains
tagline: Fast, open-source AI coding agent for JetBrains IDEs
description: Build, debug, and ship with one AI coding teammate. Kilo Code is open-source, model-agnostic AI code assistant that's pay-per use. After 420,000+ downloads on VS Code and Cursor, we're bringing it to the JetBrains ecosystem: IntelliJ IDEA, PyCharm, WebStorm...

name: Creatium
tagline: Make interactive learning that doesn’t suck
description: Create AI-powered training and learning content with coaches, role plays, and gamified lessons. Creatium is made for anyone who wants to teach anything. This AI tool is backed by research and drives real learning outcomes—not just engagement.

name: VibeSDK by CloudFlare
tagline: Deploy your AI vibe coding platform on Cloudflare in 1 click
description: VibeSDK lets you deploy your own AI-powered vibe coding platform on Cloudflare in one click. Generate, debug, and preview apps in secure sandboxes, scale instantly, integrate with multiple LLMs, and export projects to GitHub or your Cloudflare account.

name: WebTrafficWatch
tagline: Weekly insights from Google Analytics 4 & Search Console
description: Analyzes Google Analytics 4 & Google Search Console to generate weekly reports that flag significant shifts you should know about.

name: Poke.com
tagline: Text with poke, your friend, assistant, or nemisis
description: Chat with Poke, your proactive AI assistant that turns your emails into action. Poke proactively reminds you of meetings, emails that need your attention, and more. All via iMessage, SMS, or WhatsApp.

name: AI Search Crawler Check
tagline: Check if your robots.txt allows ChatGPT, Google Gemini
description: Check if ChatGPT, Claude, and Google can crawl your site in 10 seconds. Find and fix robots.txt issues blocking AI visibility.

name: Kora
tagline: Daily wisdom & voice chats with history’s greatest thinkers
description: Kora brings philosophy to life with voice chats with thinkers like Socrates, Marcus Aurelius, and Plato. Hear their wisdom, ask questions, debate ideas, or submit essays for AI critique. Plus, enjoy a daily quote to keep timeless insights part of your everyday

name: Murmur Lab
tagline: The first AI PM workspace by Currents AI
description: Discover long-tail, real-time conversations from your customers before your competitors do.

name: MarketFit
tagline: Sales AI: Don't Sell. Solve Problems.
description: 1-click.1-page.1-min Sales Enablement AI for: 1. Real-time objection handling 2. Precisely mapping buyer problems to your solutions 3. Bite-sized sales training for easy retention 4. Subconsciously building problem-solving mindset Result: 6x wins at 2x speed.

name: Remote Jobs By Startupvisors
tagline: Discover curated remote, work from home jobs globally
description: Your go-to platform for remote work. We help job seekers find verified, premium remote opportunities — freelance, full-time, and contract — across startups and global companies. For employers, we make job posting simple with free job listings.

name: VidLP
tagline: Video landing-page builder
description: Landing pages are boring. VidLp is a video-landing-page builder. Instead of long texts, VidLp lets you turn your landing page into a dynamic video experience. Upload your video, add CTAs, customize design (colors, fonts..) and connect your domain. No code.

name: Pastors.ai
tagline: ChatGPT for Churches and Sermons
description: Discover churches by what they actually preach. Pastors.ai is the first AI search engine for churches and sermons - pulling from sermon libraries to give direct responses from local pastors.

name: Orito
tagline: 1st AI Meeting Agent for Global Teams
description: The first AI Meeting Agent with sound awareness — transcribe speech with automatic speaker labeling, detect tone and environment for actionable suggestions, translate across 66 languages, and interact with transcripts using AI-powered insights.

name: Quinnsy
tagline: From Idea to Launch-Ready Course. In Minutes.
description: Don't let your valuable content sit idle. Upload your videos, docs, or writings and let Quinnsy instantly build a well-structured, launch-ready course in 5 minutes. Welcome to the future of creation: AI-guided from the start, human-in-the-loop to the finish.

name: Fundreef
tagline: The Lovable For Fundraising
description: We're launching the Lovable for Fundraising - chat with our AI to find perfect investors for your startup.

name: HeadshotCam™
tagline: Turn your selfies into professional headshots instantly
description: Transform your selfies into professional headshots in minutes. No studio, no scheduling. 93% cheaper than traditional photo shoots.

name: toolbrew
tagline: free & useful tools library, request new tools any time :)
description: Toolbrew is a free library of all those little online tools that aren’t worth signing up for or annoying an LLM about. Quick, no-ads, and you can request new tools to be added anytime.

name: HunyuanImage 3.0
tagline: Image generation with world knowledge
description: HunyuanImage 3.0 is a groundbreaking 80B open-source native multimodal model. It leverages world knowledge for reasoning and delivers industry-leading in-image text generation, rivaling top commercial models in quality and capability.

name: AI Polaroid Generator by AI Photoshoot
tagline: Create nostalgic Polaroid-style photos with anyone instantly
description: Join the viral Gemini AI Polaroid trend! Create authentic vintage instant photos with loved ones, celebrities, or your younger self. Perfect for emotional moments and Instagram-ready snapshots.

name: Banana Prompts
tagline: Copy the exact prompts behind trending AI artwork
description: Discover trending AI artwork with the exact prompts that created it. No more guessingevery image comes with complete prompt breakdowns from the creators. Learn techniques, copy prompts, and see what's actually working in AI art.
